latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers observed not to be inspected or maintained at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection stairways observed without protective barriers Stairways not provided with child height banisters Protective barriers not provided where required
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that plumbing was not installed by a licensed plumber plumbing cross connection or other hazard observed that may result in the contamination of the potable water supply Lead content of water has not been tested
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
